https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nus2BFKoYISHxVJgF4JapqnJPaH.jpg A carousing college professor's life takes a series of unimaginable turns, and all the old stories are given a new twist, when he begins to have surreal hallucinations and learns he may not be long for this world. Death of a Ladies' Man
